S.FORM: Ren'ai Ren'ai gu icuwa i Nantou. ala atjunangn mapuljat 1,219.39 km ma'linpan atjunang 909.39 km , ma'linaule atjunang 201.17 km . ala caucau mapuljat 14,966 caucau, ala daceneqlan mapuljat 4,643 a daceneqlan, Tayal, Seediq, Bunun 84 ) a maqcuwa caucau. ka cuaicuayanga ka pinaljavakan a ren'ai imaza nia sihu na dripun, sepaljavak aza qinaljan kata kadjunangan a na tjaivavav a pangaljan a tâi tiong tsiu ayain a na drinipuanan). nu vaikanga a caucau sedripun, mavan a pinapungadan a "ren'ai" taza qinaljan kata kadjunangan imaza na sihu seciukuk tucu. saka izuanga gukusiu a ren'sai i musha qinaljan nia seediq) tucu. paljavak tua atjunang matja 16 qinaljan i Ren'ai. matja 24 qinaljan imaza, Alang sasi, Alang tongan, Alang pulan, Alang snuwing, Alang bwarung, Alang toda, Masitoban, Knaziy, Bukai, Malepa, Alang sadu, Alang busi, Alang truwan, Qatu, Alang nakahara, Alang gluban, Qalang kobah, Qalang bayi, Alang marosan, Qalang mb'ala, Alang paran, Alang ruku daya, Sima un, Qalang bubun. kasicuayan cuaicuayanga a kacavilj a 1930 imaza i ren'ai, na kiqecevan a caucau a seediq ta caucau se dripun, sa namalapai tua seediq a kikarivuan cu a mkuni paran ayain. paran aicu a kangadan ta ren'ai imaza. neka pacugan na "ren'ai" ta caucau imaza, manasika kilailaing a guciu i ta taqaljaqaljan imaza itu pasemalav ta sihu kacavilj a 2002. puzangal tiamdju a cempeliv ta tja pinapungadan na qinaljan, na kadjunangan: paran aicu. mavan a ngadan aicu a sikeljakeljang nia tja kakedriyan tua anemanema a tja tjaucikel na qinaljan, tau anemanema a tja milimilingan na kadjunangan. kadjunangan i pasakaledep tua bsuringxiulin) a ren'ai gu. i pasakacedas tua qabizayyuchi gu) a ren'ai gu. i pasanavalj tua pasingheping) na taichung a ren'ai gu. i pasaviri tua nehunpu siangxinyi gu) a ren'ai gu. caucau metjuruvu a caucau imaza i ren'ai gu tucu. nu qiljas a 12 na kacavilj a 2019 a vinecikan ta sasupuan se gukusiu i ren'ai gu maljian a penuljat ta caucau imaza i ren'ai gukemasi kacavilj a 1981 a patje kacavilj a 2020) papupaysu tataleman tatuluan izua tapuluq saka unem a kedrikedri a gakku imaza i ren'ai gu. neka daigakku imaza. kakipucemelan iyubingkiuku yuzeng) sasupuan na iyubingkiuku 546 a sasupuan na iyubingkiku se ren'ai gu. remayurangan musha malalaing ti mona rudo se mahebo, se tgdaya ta caucau a seediq tu kiqecev ta caucau se dripun. namasan kakipaqenetjan a patjemiling taicu a musha imaza a kapacugan nia tja sevalitan. rngayan qmita kana klwaan truku sipacacikeljan palidring a djalan sikamasanvalulj a palidring a djalan na taiwan sikamasansimuluq saka sepatj a palidring a djalan na taiwan sikamasansimuluq saka sepatj A a palidring a djalan na taiwan sikamasan 69 a palidring a djalan na lamtaw sikamasan 71 a palidring a djalan na lamtaw sikamasan 80 a palidring a djalan na lamtaw sikamasan 83 a palidring a djalan na lamtaw sikamasan 85 a palidring a djalan na lamtaw sikamasan 87 a palidring a djalan na lamtaw sikamasan 89 a palidring a djalan na lamtaw basu basu nua kalinku basu nua lamtaw djamay
